fmiModelDescription.description: Tracking position and velocities of the aircraft and feeds the sensors

ScalarVariable.name: direction_command.roll_deg
ScalarVariable.description: Air vehicle orientation expressed as Euler angles in degrees.

ScalarVariable.name: direction_command.pitch_deg
ScalarVariable.description: Air vehicle orientation expressed as Euler angles in degrees.

ScalarVariable.name: direction_command.yaw_deg
ScalarVariable.description: Air vehicle orientation expressed as Euler angles in degrees.

ScalarVariable.name: location.x_km
ScalarVariable.description: Local navigation frame expressed in kilometers (x=North, y=East, z=Up).

ScalarVariable.name: location.y_km
ScalarVariable.description: Local navigation frame expressed in kilometers (x=North, y=East, z=Up).

ScalarVariable.name: location.z_km
ScalarVariable.description: Local navigation frame expressed in kilometers (x=North, y=East, z=Up).

ScalarVariable.name: flight_status.airspeed_mps
ScalarVariable.description: Mission computer status feedback consumed by autonomy and analysis models.

ScalarVariable.name: flight_status.angle_of_attack_deg
ScalarVariable.description: Mission computer status feedback consumed by autonomy and analysis models.

ScalarVariable.name: flight_status.health_code
ScalarVariable.description: Mission computer status feedback consumed by autonomy and analysis models.
